commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Huh? Yoshiko's not here. Where'd she go?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: You're right. She left right in the middle of eating her cheesecake.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: She mentioned going to check on the heat of the hotpot. Now that I think about it, she was mulling over something in front of the hotpot just a moment ago.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Maybe she's worried about something?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: She did not give me her usual comeback when I called her "Yoshiko," so something serious must be on her mind.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I want to help her if I can. Let's go find Yoshiko.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Yoshiko!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Eep! Ack! Why are you all here?! Go and eat your cheesecake!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Oh? Is there something wrong with us all being here?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Yoshiko. Were you hiding something from us just now?

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Ah! Stop! Don't come over here! I'm not hiding anything! Go away! Ack, no!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Whaaaaa?!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Y-Yoshiko... It looked to me as though some form of red powder was dropped into the hotpot.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Well, uh, that's... Uhh... Um... An accident! It was an accident! I didn't mean to put it all in!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Wh-What did you put into it?!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: I added in a devilish seasoning used in black magic! Something good for beauty and for health! But I wasn't planning on emptying the whole bottle out into it!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I've never heard of black magic seasoning before. I'm surprised by what you did, but it should be fine if it's good for our beauty and health.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: There is nothing fine about this! Suspicious does not even begin to describe what you have just said! For goodness' sake, what did you put into the hotpot?!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Well, it's supposed to have really good effects!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: The bubbling of the hotpot looks really scary...

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: There's a redness to it that isn't from the tomatoes or beets...

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: I-It's fine! The seasoning has deep and honorable roots in black magic, after all! There's no way it'll taste bad! Nope!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: What deep and honorable roots?! I could not be more concerned right now! Goodness me, you have made a mess of our delicious hotpot...

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I don't think you can call it a mess just yet. I mean, the hotpot tasted good when you tried it after I added the beets, right?

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: You're so positive, Emma. Okay, I'm gonna follow your example! I'll give it a taste! Here I go!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Is it okay? Rina-chan Board says, "Nervous!"

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Ooh! It's surprisingly good! Kinda like a slightly spicy tomato hotpot. You were right, Emma.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Phew, I'm stuffed! We went through a lot, but the hotpot filled with demonic seasonings, beets, mushrooms, and the veggies I got was so delicious!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: A new hotpot not bound by any one type of cuisine. Sounds like the perfect dish made by school idols, right? All's well that ends well, I guess.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: That is quite right. For all the unique ingredients to come together and create something delicious is much like a school idol group. Thankfully it turned out all right.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Then let's call this hotpot the "School Idol Hotpot!" I'll tell Honoka and the others later.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: I've still got plenty of devilish seasonings around! There's a blue powder, a yellow powder and... Should I just put them all in?

commands.speaker: Dia, Eli, Kotori, Emma, Rina
commands.line: Yoshiko!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: I-I'm just kidding... And it's Yohane, all right?
